items.textRaw: Valet misses pickup at least once a week. Trash sits in the hallway for days.
items.textSnippet: Valet misses pickup at least once a week. Trash sits in the hallway for days.

items.textRaw: Dumpster area always smells terrible. Management says it's the valet company's responsibility but nothing changes.
items.textSnippet: Dumpster area always smells terrible. Management says it's the valet company's responsibility but nothing changes.

items.textRaw: Called three times about missed pickup. Finally got a response after a week. Poor communication.
items.textSnippet: Called three times about missed pickup. Finally got a response after a week. Poor communication.

items.textRaw: Trash bags left in breezeways overnight. Attracts pests. This shouldn't be happening.
items.textSnippet: Trash bags left in breezeways overnight. Attracts pests. This shouldn't be happening.

items.textRaw: Weekend service is non-existent. They don't pick up on Saturdays at all anymore.
items.textSnippet: Weekend service is non-existent. They don't pick up on Saturdays at all anymore.

items.textRaw: Office said they're working on it but it's been months. The valet company doesn't respond to emails.
items.textSnippet: Office said they're working on it but it's been months. The valet company doesn't respond to emails.

items.textRaw: Every holiday they just skip service with no notice. Then trash piles up for days.
items.textSnippet: Every holiday they just skip service with no notice. Then trash piles up for days.

items.textRaw: The bins are always overflowing. Sometimes they don't pick up until the next day.
items.textSnippet: The bins are always overflowing. Sometimes they don't pick up until the next day.
